==Trivia==
* This soundtrack shares the same theme with [[A Casual Visit]], [[A Serendipitous Encounter]], [[Above the Sea of Clouds]], [[Adeptus' Retirement]], [[Freedom of Crane]], and [[Rainbow at Summit]].
* This soundtrack was performed by the {{w|Shanghai Symphony Orchestra}} in ''[[Genshin Concert/Reflections of Spring|GENSHIN CONCERT Special Edition: "Reflections of Spring"]]''.
